name: MEDUSA NEBULA
description:
In MEDUSA NEBULA, guide a jellyfish in a maze to reunite pairs of stars and create your constellations! 

Created for the Global Game Jam 2021 on the theme Lost and Found.

Team:

Samuel BUSSON - Technical artist

Jérémy FONGUE - Programmer

Simon GIGANT - Graphic designer

Chiara ROSMARINO - Composer

Fabrizio SANTORO - Sound designer
